com.microsoft.bingads.v13.bulk.entities

Class BulkKeywordBidSuggestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.bingads.v13.internal.bulk.BulkObject
      • com.microsoft.bingads.v13.bulk.entities.BulkKeywordBidSuggestion

  • public class BulkKeywordBidSuggestion
extends BulkObject
    Represents a best position bid suggestion that can only be read from a bulk file by the BulkFileReader when reading the corresponding BulkKeyword. An instance of this class can represent a single keyword bid position, and thus one record in the bulk file.
    See Also:
    BulkServiceManager, BulkOperation, BulkFileReader
